data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_28f223447f0174336ff0922d364d81d3.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Akai gains a 25<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> shield for 4s on each skill cast and marks enemy heroes and Creeps hit by his skills.

Akai's Basic Attacks deal 25<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to marked enemies.

Akai charges in the target direction, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way. If Akai hits an enemy hero during this process, he'll knock them airborne for 0.5s and be able to roll in the Joystick's direction once.

Akai can cast <font color="a6aafb">Headbutt</font> during <font color="a6aafb">Heavy Spin</font> to quickly adjust his position.
Akai smashes the ground with his body, dealing 270<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 45% for 2s.

Akai removes all debuffs on him and spins for 4s, gaining Slow Immunity while continuously dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Enemy heroes knocked back will knock back other heroes they collide with during the process.

Akai also gradually increases his Movement Speed by 70% over the duration. This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression and Morph effects.

data.name: Akai

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: High-HP equipment. Balanced damage and tankiness.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After the next Basic Attack, deal <Num1> Magic Damage to nearby enemies.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1: Burning Soul: Deals <font color="26e407"> (+0.012 Total HP)</font> Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second. This damage is increased by 125(+15*Hero Level)% against creeps and minions.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Burning Soul: Deals <font color="26e407"> (+0.012 Total HP)</font> Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second. This damage is increased by 125(+15*Hero Level)% against creeps and minions.
equiplist.equiptips:
+1200 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

equiplist.equipskill1: Twilight: Upon taking more than 500 damage in a single instance, the excess damage beyond that amount is reduced by 20<font color="26e407"> (+0.002 Total HP)</font>%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Twilight: Upon taking more than 500 damage in a single instance, the excess damage beyond that amount is reduced by 20<font color="26e407"> (+0.002 Total HP)</font>%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+1200 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: AI.Ps
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The almighty panda hero of Stream Valley.

assist.desc: Akai works best with heroes who can deal high burst damage as they can help him take down enemies caught in his Ultimate, such as Saber and Eudora.

strong.desc: Akai is strong against heroes with poor Mobility since he can easily catch and eliminate them with his Ultimate, such as Eudora and Odette.

weak.desc: Akai is countered by heroes with CC removers or transformation abilities that allow them to escape or counter Akai's Ultimate, such as Nana and Diggie.
